name: HeatDash
description:
Fast-Paced Top Down Bullet Madness. Can you survive the onslaught of Red Skulls and Eyeballs long enough to bring the system back online? I cant, its really hard.

Controls: Left and Right Click. How to Play: Shooting builds Heat, Dashing spends Heat. Don't die and construct the pylons. Credits: I made all of this by myself because I'm such a big boy.
